s.text: Novak says that Microsoft's strategy is to drag out its appeal until a Republican wins the White House (and presumably drops the lawsuit).
The one thing the liberals can't stand is a successful corporation.

Carlson warns that Wolf's advocacy of "heavy petting" and "onanism" will not help Gore's popularity, though it might spice up his campaign.
Barone notes that advice on gender issues is common in campaigns.
